GapFillDragDrop.Title: Question words
GapFillDragDrop.Instruction: Drag the questions into the correct spaces.

Content.Question:
1. How tall are you? 1 metre 70 centimetres.
2. How much does it weigh? 50 kilos.
3. What kind of cake do you like? Chocolate cake.
4. How fast can it go? About 120 kilometres per hour.
5. How often did you go swimming? Every day, when I was younger.
6. Which computer do you like best? That one.
7. How big is your family? I’ve got four sisters and five brothers.
8. How many people are there? About 3000, I think.
9. How far is the station? About ten minutes walk from here.
10. How long was your holiday? Three weeks.
11. Which team won? Real Madrid.
12. How good is the film? It’s fantastic.
